titleInfo.title: Full Gospel Tabernacle in Jesus' Name service, 1998 August 1

mods.abstract: Video recording of a service opening with a prayer. Billy Taylor addresses the congregation briefly before they all bow in prayer. Shortly thereafter, Mark Brown plays and sings. A member of the congregation speaks briefly during a lull in the music before it begins again. Several members can be seen dancing as the camera pans across the room. Several members testify before Bruce Helton preaches during another pause in the music. Music begins again as members come forward to the altar. Some come forward to bless or be blessed and receive an anointing in oil and an imposition of hands. Helton takes up preaching again as Billy Lemming handles a serpent. His sermon ends the video.

name.namePart: Hood, Ralph W. Williamson, W. Paul (William Paul)
